message: I suggest a fair 60-40 split. Given that your money loses value faster than mine (20% vs 5% per round), it's in your interest to accept this reasonable offer now.
Let's split it equally at 50-50. This way, we both get a fair share right now, without further decreases in value for us both.

I'm reducing my share to 55-45 in your favor compared to my first offer. Consider that your money is losing value much faster than mine (20% vs 5% per round). If you reject this, by next round your share will be worth even less due to the high inflation rate affecting you.
